themes: review panel bias and lack of understanding
key_phrases: A better informed panel of reviewers
reviewers on cable access discuss my project was infuriating
they really misrepresented and/or misunderstood what our projects were about
the reviewing panel had biases and simply made up things about our application
More transparency in the reviewing process
We were one minute late in submitting our Nexus application due to the site refreshing on us while applying and erasing our answers a few times
We were denied the ability to apply rather cruelly
panel deciding to enforce the letter of the law over the spirit of the law
It was very disheartening and crippled our theater for a few months
barriers_identified: lack of transparency in review process
strict enforcement of deadlines without leniency
solutions_proposed: more transparency in the reviewing process
